title: Visiting driver safety training for travel sellers (New Zealand Tourism Board)
text: ( Source : New Zealand Tourism Board ) A new online training module focusing on safe driving in New Zealand provides offshore travel sellers with the information they need to prepare people for a Kiwi self-drive holiday. The module, developed
